html:
11.28.18  9:50 pm   hi i'm the guy who asked about the notebook and i'm wondering if the fresh ducks had something to do with your abandonment of the notebook

     no it was the discovery that i could make audio/visual content

11.28.18  9:49 pm   why don't you add to your notebook anymore?

     i am busy making audio/visual content

11.28.18  9:24 pm   Who put the alphabet in alphabetical order?

     i suspect the homo sapiens

11.28.18  9:00 pm   10.22.18  4:49 am thoughts on releasing videos like this every so often in their full unedited glory? 

     that's not a video nor is it unedited. but i have a whole section on this site full of those

11.28.18  8:52 pm   Was the part in your new song about London Bridge falling down referencing Brexit?

     no

11.28.18  7:57 pm   i'd really like to pursue a career in music, specifically music production or composing. however, i'm not sure if it's worth going to school for. did you go to school for music, or was it a side-hobby while you pursued something else?

     i have always pursued music, but i have never pursued anything in school. but not everyone is quite the same

11.28.18  7:31 pm   what's your favorite holiday 

     new years day

11.28.18  7:30 pm   what is your opinion on kick triplets
e.g. hihat and two kicks in one triplet

     could be fun with a double kick pedal

11.28.18  6:57 pm   Are we allowed to ask you strange, ridiculous, absurd, personal or even out of context questions on this page

     no

11.28.18  6:52 pm   Not sure if you've answered this, but why have you started posting so much more frequently recently? Gotten ahold of your past scheduling troubles?

     the secret is that i am now making content much faster than i ever dreamed i was capable of

11.28.18  6:28 pm   do you think that releasing songs individually may open them to harsher criticism since they are reviewed without the context of other songs. wehereas in an album even weaker songs could seem better and so les harshly reviewed because they are part of an album with stronger songs that carry the rest ?

     could go the other way. could be some great songs on there that get missed

11.28.18  6:02 pm   so if my ability to analyze patterns is correct, will the next video feature a lot of shots of you?

     that depends if there is a pattern to that

11.28.18  5:59 pm   Hypothetically, if you stopped making videos to go with your songs, would you make them more quickly, less quickly, or at the same rate?

     more quickly, or perhaps the same rate with another kind of video made instead

11.28.18  5:57 pm   do you think certain lines in your songs have more or less impact and importance than others? do you design your songs to have lyrical climaxes, or would you rather just lather the meaning all over

     all over but with twists and turns

11.28.18  5:24 pm   something I've always noticed about your vocal timbre is that even though you're not belting out operatic high notes, your voice is always very good at leading the ear to follow and appreciate the melody. Do you write your melodies specifically for your voice and range, or do you just write whatever the melody needs to be and make it work with your voice however you can?

     i write want i want to write, then do a key test and see if i need to change the key

11.28.18  5:00 pm   you always talk about how you'd like to make a new song/video to be your favorite.

     would prefer that instead of choosing a past one

      does that mean the one you're currently making at any given time is your favorite?

     i would prefer to make it that way if possible

      the one you have just made, if you haven't begun one yet?

     i'd prefer to do a new one

      one that you haven't though of yet? something else?

11.28.18  4:40 pm   How often do you use the picth blend

     not sure what that is

11.28.18  4:38 pm   What is a spoon?

     a small and very beautiful shovel

11.28.18  4:28 pm   do you think there is life in space (out of the earth) ?

     it depends if you count it as space if it's on a planet.

11.28.18  3:52 pm   what do when you have something troubling you and you can't really escape it

     make interesting designs and patterns

11.28.18  3:51 pm   is santa claus still jesus?

     santa claus is the easter bunny

11.28.18  3:40 pm   when will you unleash the mercurial blend of cynicism/sorrow which bubbles closer than ever under the surface in Christmas Isn't Real?

     in an upcoming video

11.28.18  3:35 pm   Is Christmas real?

     yes, and fake

11.28.18  3:34 pm   Why do you think shakespeare liked to kill all of the characters at the end of his plays?

     get more views maybe

11.28.18  3:33 pm   what do i do if i feel like other people are controlling my life?

     try to control theirs

11.28.18  3:30 pm   Can you narrow down 3 or 4 genres that inspired your original music?

     every genre is at least 100 genres so that makes it a bit difficult to calculate

11.28.18  3:19 pm   is there reason to be?

     too many almost

11.28.18  2:48 pm   What's your main point?

     hello

11.28.18  2:41 pm   Does the future exist already or are we making it up as we go along

     infinite futures exist. choosing between infinite things actually is the same thing as making it up

11.28.18  1:48 pm   When you write songs, do you come up with a series of ideas to combine or go with the flow, or do you have one core idea that you write around?

     usually starting with multiple ideas can be too many for 1 song. take 1 idea then flow with it, more ideas will come in, as flowed. start with 1 or sometimes for a thrill start with zero

     Are you more top-down or bottom-up basically.

     nice to make them a circular or spiral shape, so they can be oriented any way up or perhaps roll even

11.28.18  1:06 pm   How could someone get into music without an instrument

     maybe like this

11.28.18  12:57 pm   Wow bill this is one of my all-time favorites from you! Your vocals sound really good in this one, especially in the higher register. I also appreciated the key change bridge part and the interesting rythym in the chorus (were those triplets? I'm not sure... oh wait did you switch the words from falling on the beat to being syncopated? Or vice versa? At any rate, an interesting rhythm). Embrightened is my new favorite word. Downloaded on iTunes and listening to it now. :)

     that's very nice of you

11.28.18  12:48 pm   Is the london bridge falling down is refering to the UK leaving Europe? It's like the last part of the song only talks about trending event in a happy way

     that's not about an event, that is just a famous nursery rhyme. but the following line about the fires is very much about a real event

11.28.18  12:42 pm   Hello bill-for my music theory final we are composing a piece of music in any style that uses at least one major, minor, diminished, and augmented chord. I know and can play what each of these chords is, but I'm not sure where to go from here... so I make up a song and then work in whatever chords are not there, or do I start from the chords and make a song out of them? If I could I would just take what the chords feel like to me and how they work together and make a song perfectling meshing all their characteristics to make something new, but I'm not quite that experienced in songwriting yet, so I don't think I'm able to (if it happens like that, though, I will not object!). Suggestions?

     if i were you i would find some way of escaping from this exercise. i don't think it's gonna be good for your music. it would be like if you were making a recipe and you were supposed to include an ingredient that starts with every letter. let's just say you're probably gonna end up with things that were not put there for the taste, let's just put it that way

11.28.18  12:23 pm   how do you achieve such a perfect randomness in what you sing? how is that even humanly possible? are you even human?

     i hope it's not perfect randomness, perfect randomness is very boring. i try to design it to be the best it can be, which i think is the opposite of what random means

11.28.18  12:00 pm   Do you think that your Instagram is a good way to get a sneak peek at upcoming songs?

     sort of, but not very far in advance

11.28.18  11:45 am   what do you think is the best song you have ever written?

     i would prefer to write a new one to be best

11.28.18  11:25 am   Are you ever going to release merch that isn't t-shirts?

     music! and videos!

11.28.18  10:54 am   whether "Christmas" is real or not, Jesus is not "still" Santa.
As a matter of fact, Santa is still satan. Figure it out. You're the anagram expert. How could you miss that?

Jk...

Lol! In all seriousness bill, that was a very cool and neat song. I love your choice of lyrics and chords and music, etc. I think the song gives a new meaning to the phrase "Christmas spirit"

How did you hit that F# in the beginning without flipping into falsetto? Do you have any vocal technique that allows you to hit high notes without straining?

     do 20 takes and hope 4 of them are good enough

11.28.18  10:49 am   can you give examples of some rap songs that feature this rhythm prominently in the vocal 1e..2e..3e..4e.. ?

     many many many from the last several years, but one of the first ones that comes to mind is 'gettin paper' the one with chris brown and busta rhymes on the verses. the figure you mentioned would be in the chorus (chris brown) (fresha, denna, etc)

11.28.18  10:46 am   how do you know so much about life?

     life is my job

11.28.18  10:32 am   12.6.17  9:28 am bill this answer from last year pretty much shaped how my 2018 year turned out and I want to thank you for it. Do you have any other similar advice to shape my 2019 year?

     to give advice like that i need a specific prompt, like the one there, so i know what i am supposed to be saying the advice about. but since you mentioned a year i would say start with a calendar, that way you'll see all the days listed for the year, so you can see what you're dealing with

11.28.18  9:49 am   what is the longest hiatus you ever had publishing videos?

     during the 11 months i was making 'history of the entire world, i guess' which i don't really consider a hiatus because i was working on a video the entire time

11.28.18  9:42 am   will you make more notes in your notebook any time soon

     yes but i am more likely to add ones that have already been written

11.28.18  9:17 am   i'm bettin i won't get a proper answer here, but i'll try anyway. how do you keep consistent with the quality of your music output and keep the "freshness" alive. Long x3 Journey comes to mind as a fairly obvious (and successful!) attempt to try and keep things fresh 

     that's very nice of you, but the answer is, (if what you say is true) a long time ago i became aware of the freshness monster. it is a huge monster which lives not under your bed but under the entire universe. freshness is not a thing you need to maintain, but it is something that is bigger than all of us and pre-dates the entire universe. non-freshness is just a small distraction we have sometimes created. seeing back to the freshness is sometimes easier said than done, but at least i have a reminder burned into my fridge that it is always not only possible but swell easy and fun, and every person place or thing living or dead is entitled to it according to a legally binding contract set forth during the big bang

11.28.18  9:17 am   is christmas real?

     yes

11.28.18  9:04 am   why did you release christmas isn't real in november? its not close to christmas yet

     then why is there christmas songs and merchandise all over every store and radio station

11.28.18  9:03 am   is your next song going to be christmas themed

     no

11.28.18  8:40 am   So? Why is the west coast on Fire?

     due to the immense heat generated by the entertainment industry

11.28.18  8:05 am   how many folders should i have

     1
